experience.title: System Analyst
experience.description: • (10+ Years)Experience as in testing• (3+ Years)Doing RCA of all the leakages.• (8+ Years)Involved in UI testing, Performance testing, preparation of Test cases executedFunctional tests, tracked defects and stored them in Defect Reports.• (3+ Years)Selenium,QTP,Winrunner• (2+ Years)Junit and Testng frame works.• (2+ Years)Worked on data driven framework,Execution on scripts through Ant and batchfiles.• (7+ Years)Experience in both web desktop and mobile applications• (1+ Years)Experience in Performance Testing using Jmeter.• (1+ Years)Experience in Badboy – Open source Functional Automation tool• (1+ Years)Experience in testing webservices, WSDL using SOAPUI through Groovy.• (1+ Years)Experience in Security testing using XSS Me plug-in for Cross Side Scripting.• (7+ Years)Experience in Defect reporting tool such as Bugzila,test track,forbugz,JIRA.• Operating system worked upon WindowsXP, Windows 2003,Windows VISTA,Ubuntu,MAC• (2+ Years)Functional automation through TPTP Automation of Eclipse RCP• (5+ Years)Creating Closed defect distribution chart• Other tools like Filezila, F-Secure, Snag-it, Fiddler , Document versioning and maintenancethrough perforce, SVN,CR maintenance through sales force, Experience in Test Link – Opensource Test Management tool• Experience in delivering software testing solutions using Agile, Scrum waterfallmethodologies, ideally in a continuous integration and continuous delivery environment.• (3+Years)Experience in providing Test Estimation –UseCase/WBS, Test Planning.• (3+Years)Experience in Distributed Deployment (DD), Patch, Result Analysis, DefectReporting & Mgmt, Monitoring Project Schedules and Mgmt.Analyzed the Business Requirements Document, created the test plan and prepared detailed test cases for new Functionality.Participated in the meetings, prepared reports and other supportive documentation to contribute to establishment of standards and procedures for software testing.
